item.title: Viral Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone who is experienced creating viral short-form video content for personal brands.

- Video Editing

Here are some examples of what I'm looking for:

https://www.instagram.com/p/C79qGFxodRv/?hl=en-gb
https://www.instagram.com/p/C74eS0uoQxs/?hl=en-gb

I'm looking for someone who has some experience creating similar content and has a case study of creating successful short-form content.

You don't need to be a pro, I'm just looking for someone who understands how to make short form pop.

Please attach examples of viral content like the above you have created.

Thanks :)


Hourly Range: $3.00-$8.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 07:45 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Short Videos Expert for Modern Product Promotions - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented short videos expert to create smart, nice, and modern video clips that will be used to promote our products. The videos should be visually appealing, engaging, and effectively showcase the features and benefits of our products. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing techniques, storytelling, and the ability to bring ideas to life through visuals.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Creativity
- Attention to detail

Size: Medium
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 07:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Design, Video Commercial
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Eye contact video - serious face - Upwork
item.description:
I need people to film eye-practising videos of themselves. BE SERIOUS in video like you're having an important conversation with someone.

You'll basically have to film a video of yourself looking at the camera for 5 minutes

EASY WORK - $10 + 5 star review on Upwork

Become a part of the project that helps people get rid of social anxiety

***Details:
Video example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5w3cYtJekpw

- High-quality high-resolution video (need to have good smartphone or camera)
-     Film in daylight (don't film in evening, otherwise video quality will be bad)
- You shouldn’t be too far in video (only head and neck should be visible)
- Horizontal video
-      You should be STANDING (not sitting)
- Minimum 5 minutes long
- Camera should be stable and at eye level (not from below or above)
- DON'T SMILE, but blink naturally and make natural face expressions
- You can film indoors or outdoors
- Sounds on

Interested? Film a trial 15-20 seconds video to see if it looks good (send here or upload to google drive)

*****IMPORTANT: those who don't send trial videos will be rejected straight away


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 16, 2024 07:16 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Country: Lithuania
click to apply
